title: After the new update i.e Android 11 , some parts of my screen doesn't work and also many apps crash
content:
While chatting on whatsapp and also having the picture in picture mode on the keyboard goes blank can't see a single thing and also sometimes even they touch doesn't works , for example the back button gesture , and while playing Call of duty suddenly down portion of touch screen stops working have to restart the game again whenever it happens . And this all problem started after updating the system to ANDROID 11 . 

And also this phone is PIXEL 2XL  there wasn't an option  in select details
